dcterms:description: The Cityscapes dataset is designed for semantic urban scene understanding, providing high-quality pixel-level annotations for various urban scenes.
dcterms:title: Cityscapes

dcterms:creator: Stephan R Richter
Vibhav Vineet

dcterms:description: GTA5 is a synthetic dataset created from a video game, providing ground truth annotations for various urban scenes, used for training models in domain adaptation tasks.
dcterms:title: GTA5

dcterms:creator: German Ros
Laura Sellart
Joanna Materzynska
David Vazquez
Antonio M Lopez
dcterms:description: The SYNTHIA dataset is a large collection of synthetic images specifically designed for semantic segmentation of urban scenes, providing diverse scenarios and conditions.
dcterms:title: SYNTHIA
